function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in a hospital surge ward and ICU","Impact":"Risk of disease spread and infection among patients, healthcare workers, and visitors","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective air filtration systems and ventilation strategies, strict infection control measures, and regular testing of patients and staff","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filtration systems, UV-C air sanitization, and HEPA filters","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital administration and management"},{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in the ward before air filter activation","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission through airborne particles in the ward","Mitigation":"Activation of air filters, continuous operation of air filtration systems, and regular monitoring for presence of SARS-CoV-2 RNA","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filtration systems, continuous air quality measurement, and air flow control","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital administration and management"},{"Description":"Failure to detect SARS-CoV-2 RNA on control sampler","Impact":"Risk of false-negative results and potential underestimation of disease presence","Mitigation":"Validation of control sampler, double-checking testing procedures, and regular verification of testing accuracy","Technologies":"Quality control measures for testing equipment, validation protocols for testing procedures, and regular calibration of testing devices","People":"Laboratory technicians, healthcare workers","Owner":"Laboratory management"}]}
